title: Can anyone help me out?
body: hey i opened those snowdown store discount things and i was supppperrr hyped to see a 70% off Death Blossom Elise, but whenever i go to try buy it comes up with that error thing and to try again. I understand the error with the whole error thing with challenger ahri but i dont understand why im getting the same bug for an elise skin. Anyone know whats up?

replies.body:
Hey puma paw, try uninstalling and reinstalling league of legends. Don't worry, uninstalling the game won't delete your account. If uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't work, try sending a report to Riot.
I hope this helped
-Liam
hey man  i can get u the ahri skin an the other skin for u if u want ill get u it in 3 days :>

https://imageshack.com/i/hlXDdlgDp 

i didnt know how to attach a file and stuff so here is a link to my screenshot thanks for any help you give :)

Hi Puma Paw, this is news to me so thanks for bringing it up.

Would it be possible for you to try again and if it fails take a screenshot of the error message and post it here?
From there I'll see if this is something I need to pass on to another team or if we can fix it for you here.

Otherwise, you can [submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as MasterMirkinen suggested and they should sort this out for you.

Hey Puma Paw,
that sucks, sorry about that.
Could you send an email to Player Support?
They will fix this for you!
